name: dinhanhthi.com
description: A personal website for note-taking built based on 11ty engine with high performance.

scripts.re-install: npx rimraf ./node_modules && npx rimraf ./package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.build: npx rimraf -rf _site && npm run js:build && npm run css:build && eleventy && mkdir -p _live && rm -r _live/* && cp -Rf _site/* _live/
scripts.sample:watch-no-opt: concurrently "npm run sample:serve-no-opt" "npm run css:watch-local" "npm run js:build-watch" -c green,blue,red -n 11ty,css,js
scripts.sample:watch-opt: concurrently "npm run sample:serve-opt" "npm run css:watch-local" "npm run js:build-watch" -c green,blue,red -n 11ty,css,js
scripts.sample:build-opt: npm run js:build && npm run css:build && npm run sample:11ty-opt
scripts.full:watch-no-opt: concurrently "npm run full:serve-no-opt" "npm run css:watch-local" "npm run js:build-watch" -c green,blue,red -n 11ty,css,js
scripts.full:build-http-serve-opt: npm run build && npm run full:http-serve-opt
scripts.css:watch-local: npx rimraf src/css/main.css && node-sass -w --source-comments src/css/main.scss src/css/main.css
scripts.site:build-update: npm run site:build && npm run site:update
